trans-unit.source: Combines the specified paths into a single path.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的路径合并到单个路径。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.CombinePath"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the base path to combine with the other paths.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要与其他路径组合的基路径。

trans-unit.source: Can be a relative path, absolute path, or blank.
trans-unit.target: 可以是相对路径、 绝对路径，或者为空。

trans-unit.source: The base path to combine with the other paths.
trans-unit.target: 要与其他路径组合的基路径。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the combined path that is created by the `CombinePath` task.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置创建的组合的路径`CombinePath`任务。

trans-unit.source: The combined path that is created by the `CombinePath` task.
trans-unit.target: 通过创建的组合的路径`CombinePath`任务。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if task execution succeeded; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果任务成功执行;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a list of individual paths to combine with the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.CombinePath.BasePath*> to form the combined path.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.CombinePath.BasePath*>成组合的路径</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.CombinePath.BasePath*>组合的各个路径的列表

trans-unit.source: Paths can be relative or absolute.
trans-unit.target: 路径可以是相对或绝对。

trans-unit.source: A list of individual paths to combine with the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.CombinePath.BasePath*> to form the combined path.
trans-unit.target: 列表中的各个路径加<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.CombinePath.BasePath*>成组合路径。</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.CombinePath.BasePath*>
